reapack.name: X-Raym_16 pads MIDI Notes Map.jsfx
reapack.desc: 16 pads MIDI Notes Map

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: + Nice colored pads + Hide sliders, now offset with clicks + Infos on Pad + Pad brightness based on velocity

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: + Image support. Image file mapping have to be put in REAPER/Data/MIDINotesImages and should contains note number followed by filename with extension (36 kick.png). Images have to be put in /Images from the effect path. # Fixed base note color offset # minor UI tweaks

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: # Remap active toggle, so you an check how some beats could be performed on your remapped pad.

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: + All Notes off if slider change

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: + Note channel mapping via Shift+Click (thx abaco!)

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: # Flexible width and height (non square design)

version.changelog: # Change CSV separator from . to , This is not compatible with v1 workflow + Works with MIDI channels in CSV files + Basic GUI

version.author: X-Raym
version.changelog: # Channel fix # Sequence position reinitialized when file is changed
